SELECT a.id, a.`name` contentName, a.html_content htmlContent, a.html_type htmlType, a.js_content jsContent, a.js_type jsType, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM ds_form_content a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.`name` LIKE '%${contentName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.`name` contentName FROM ds_form_content a WHERE a.`name` = #{contentName}
mapper.insert: INSERT into ds_form_content (id, `name`, html_content, html_type, js_content, js_type, linked_data, data_show_tpl, default_data, create_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{contentName}, #{htmlContent}, #{htmlType}, #{jsContent}, #{jsType}, #{linkedData}, #{dataShowTpl}, #{defaultData}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`name` contentName, a.html_content htmlContent, a.js_content jsContent, a.linked_data linkedData, a.data_show_tpl dataShowTpl, a.default_data defaultData, b.template_content templateContent FROM ds_form_content a LEFT JOIN ds_form_display_template b ON a.data_show_tpl = b.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.`name` contentName FROM ds_form_content a WHERE a.`name` = #{contentName} AND a.id != #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.linked_data linkedData, a.default_data defaultData, b.template_content templateContent FROM ds_form_content a LEFT JOIN ds_form_display_template b ON a.data_show_tpl = b.id WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
